title: It shall also be permissible for the developer / owner to utilise the FSI available for free sale housing component, fully / partly for any other user otherwise permissible as per UDCPR
clause_text: It shall also be permissible for the developer / owner to utilise the FSI available for free sale housing component, fully / partly for any other user otherwise permissible as per UDCPR.
section: Release of FSI under the Scheme shall be as follows :-
